Start-Text: The third version of PCP inventory was approved by the federal counsil in 2009 and contains 3200 objects of national importance. The PCP Section in the Federal Office for Civil Protection (FOCP) together with the cantons are responsible for the update. Discover the objects of cultural value and try to localize them on the map.
